subject: Shipment
description_text:
I ordered a set of pedals on November 6 but still hasn't been shipped out

Order #SSN3279

conversations.body_text: Hi BILO,    We require your address in English format. We sent you a confirmation email but have not received a reply. Please confirm that this address is correct.  6612 11D, Hai Al Bahr District   Al Khobar 34218   Eastern Province   Saudi Arabia

Yes it's correct

On Mon, 10 Nov 2025, 9:12 am service@simsonn.com,

How can we fix this problem?

On Mon, 10 Nov 2025, 9:12 am service@simsonn.com,

Hi BILO,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Your package containing hydraulic rods was returned as prohibited items. We can only ship it via an alternative logistics channel, which incurs a high cost of 1060 RMB, equivalent to 149 USD. We require you to cover the 39 USD shipping fee, and we will ship the item to you at cost price.

How much do you need me to pay?

On Wed, 12 Nov 2025, 2:13 pm service@simsonn.com,
Hi BILO,      Thank you for your understanding! You only need to pay $39. You can click this link to make the payment.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1
When will the tracking get updated?
Hi BILO,    We have arranged for your order to be reshipped. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01251639632
